General.Name: Silver Bullet Mines Corp.
General.Description: Silver Bullet Mines Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and extraction of natural resources, specifically precious metals in Arizona, Idaho, and Nevada. It primarily focuses on the development and operation of its Buckeye Silver Mine located outside of Globe, Arizona. The company is based in Burlington, Canada.
General.Address: 3310 South Service Road, Burlington, ON, Canada, L7N 3M6
